"Obligations by PoPStateCode - Tiny to Exclude" identifies Place of Performance State Codes (PoPStateCode) which do not exceed $100 million in total obligations in any given year from 2000-2013 or over $1 billion for the period.

In total, there are 14 PoPStateCodes excluded by this threshold:

VI
AS
MP
AE
PW
US
UK
GM
GB
JA
ON
QC
"   "  (Just a blank)
BC

This analysis was performed using a custom query drawing off of the view Summary.CompetitionVehicleHistoryBucketSubCustomerClassification
